attributes.title: Don’t get the app
attributes.review: If I could put a 0 star review I would. App keeps crashing and it keep keeps freezing

attributes.title: Guys don’t get this app
attributes.review: After 2 weeks of downloading the app undownloaded itself!! i love seeing this orange sexy mans face and his products but this app is terrible

attributes.title: Can’t EVEN with this app
attributes.review: The app CONSTANTLY crashes, the design is trash (like what, did a child make it?) barely anything fits the screen, and so much more!!!I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP!

attributes.title: How Rude
attributes.review: I got this app bc I saw on an ad that if I download it, I will get a lot of money but I didn’t get anything.😭😭 No one deserves to get lied to, this app needs to hit the road. 😗✌️

attributes.title: Biden 2020
attributes.review: Kick that orange man and his stupid app out of the White House.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Made my phone crash and glitch and i had to get a new one

attributes.title: but hair
attributes.review: i HATED THIS APP!!!! it’s so confusing and it made my but hair crackle 😭😭😭 please make it BETTER. or else if you don’t my but will crack again 💔 i’m giving this also a 1 star because MY FLIPPIN BUT HAIR ALSO MADE ME TOOT 😭😭 I DONT WANNA GO TO HOSPITAL AGAIN PLEASE OR ELSE 😈😈

attributes.title: This app is not it
attributes.review: This app is trash no one should ever feel the pain of seeing a Cheeto suffer like that 😣 I’m sorry for all of you that had to see the ugliest Cheeto ever

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: Here I was expecting a GREAT APP That represented our great America but instead is caused my phone to glitch now it doesn’t turn on come on man

attributes.title: Ughh
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and like it broke my phone 😳that’s how horrible this app is 😘bye this app is so awful like Fr Fr what kind of app is this
